column1: #Text=Asami says : " If we stop that mecha giant , it will all be because of you . "
#Text=Hiroshi says : " You 're the one who designed these incredible suits .
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " I love you , too .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I have something I need to attach before we take off .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Attached to what ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " I need to attach this ring to your finger .
#Text=Zhu Li Moon , will you do the thing for the rest of our lives ?
#Text=Now let 's go attach these barely functional rust buckets to a giant killer smashing machine !
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " It 's exactly how I always pictured our engagement .
